DOC.brief_summary: Patients randomly assign two separate group . Both patient group evaluate use WHOQOL-BREF questionaire . Evaluations carry study begin interval six month period one year total three evaluation . Group one make patient begin homeopathy acupuncture anthroposophic medicine treatment patient group two start homeopathy acupuncture anthroposophic medicine six month begin study . Each one three research branch do independently ( Homeopathy versus control ; Acupuncture versus control ; Anthroposophic Medicine versus control ) . Conventional medical treatment available patient group . A data sheet fill patient data age , education level , marital status patient 's perception health status . During interview interviewer influence whatsoever respondent ' answer . Integrative/complementary traditional medicine doctor participate research inform patient participate project , research blind doctor . Minitab software , version 16 , use sample calculation module Power Sample Size . Sample calculation option pair t-tests intervention demonstrate need randomize 906 patient : 450 patient homeopathy branch ( 225 patient homeopathy group 225 patient control group ) , 228 patient acupuncture branch ( 114 patient acupuncture group 114 patient control group ) , 228 patient anthroposophic medicine branch ( 114 patient anthroposophic medicine group 114 patient control group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Homeopathy , Acupuncture Anthroposophic Medicine Women 's Quality Life
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year age Patients chronic disease Women 18 year age Previous treatment homeopathy ( homeopathy versus control branch ) Previous treatment acupuncture ( acupuncture versus control branch ) Previous treatment anthroposophic medicine ( anthroposophic medicine versus control branch )
